t_photo_highlights::clip_card_4::goals[0: Look for moments when your characters interact.
t_photo_highlights::clip_card_6::goals[0: Photograph the primary characters in your story.
t_photo_highlights::title: Highlights
t_photo_highlights::clip_card_3::goals[0: Pay attention to your characters-capture what makes them unique.
t_photo_highlights::clip_card_7::goals[0: Look for a climax or dramatic finish, photograph it.
t_photo_highlights::clip_card_2::goals[0: Shoot one picture that sums up what the story is about.
t_photo_highlights::clip_card_1::goals[0: Capture a character essential to your story.
t_photo_highlights::text_card_0::text: This is a highlights story, it will help you photograph the best moments in your story. Highlights stories are structured less to illustrate a clear story line and more to show the peak moments or most dramatic aspects of the topic.
t_photo_highlights::clip_card_5::goals[0: Something drew you personally to this story, photograph it.
t_photo_highlights::clip_card_0::goals[0: Show the location, try a wide shot of the location of your story.
